description: This trap is sent each time a transport connection
enters `connected' state.
The object identifier indicates the transport domain
of this transport connection.
variables.name: A3Com-DLSW-r1-MIB::dlswTConnOperTDomain

description: The remote transport address of this transport connection.
variables.name: A3Com-DLSW-r1-MIB::dlswTConnOperRemoteTAddr

description: This trap is sent each time a transport connection
enters `disconnected' state.
The object identifier indicates the transport domain
of this transport connection.
variables.name: A3Com-DLSW-r1-MIB::dlswTConnOperTDomain

description: The remote transport address of this transport connection.
variables.name: A3Com-DLSW-r1-MIB::dlswTConnOperRemoteTAddr

description: This trap is sent each time a circuit enters
`connected' state.
objects.test: $SNMPTRAPCMD A3Com-DLSW-r1-MIB::dlswTrapCircuitUp A3Com-DLSW-r1-MIB::dlswCircuitS1Mac s EXAMPL A3Com-DLSW-r1-MIB::dlswCircuitS1Sap s E A3Com-DLSW-r1-MIB::dlswCircuitS2Mac s EXAMPL A3Com-DLSW-r1-MIB::dlswCircuitS2Sap s E

description: The MAC Address of End Station 1 (S1) used for this circuit.
variables.name: A3Com-DLSW-r1-MIB::dlswCircuitS1Mac

description: The SAP at End Station 1 (S1) used for this circuit.
variables.name: A3Com-DLSW-r1-MIB::dlswCircuitS1Sap

description: The MAC Address of End Station 2 (S2) used for this circuit.
variables.name: A3Com-DLSW-r1-MIB::dlswCircuitS2Mac

description: The SAP at End Station 2 (S2) used for this circuit.
variables.name: A3Com-DLSW-r1-MIB::dlswCircuitS2Sap

description: This trap is sent each time a circuit enters
`disconnected' state.
objects.test: $SNMPTRAPCMD A3Com-DLSW-r1-MIB::dlswTrapCircuitDown A3Com-DLSW-r1-MIB::dlswCircuitS1Mac s EXAMPL A3Com-DLSW-r1-MIB::dlswCircuitS1Sap s E A3Com-DLSW-r1-MIB::dlswCircuitS2Mac s EXAMPL A3Com-DLSW-r1-MIB::dlswCircuitS2Sap s E

description: The MAC Address of End Station 1 (S1) used for this circuit.
variables.name: A3Com-DLSW-r1-MIB::dlswCircuitS1Mac

description: The SAP at End Station 1 (S1) used for this circuit.
variables.name: A3Com-DLSW-r1-MIB::dlswCircuitS1Sap

description: The MAC Address of End Station 2 (S2) used for this circuit.
variables.name: A3Com-DLSW-r1-MIB::dlswCircuitS2Mac

description: The SAP at End Station 2 (S2) used for this circuit.
variables.name: A3Com-DLSW-r1-MIB::dlswCircuitS2Sap
